scripts.deploy:frontend: cross-env-shell cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy DvkUsEastStack SquatSiteStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:pipeline:dev: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=dev cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy DvkPipelineStack SquatPipelineStack AdminPipelineStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:pipeline:test: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=test cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy DvkPipelineStack SquatPipelineStack AdminPipelineStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:pipeline:prod: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=prod cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy DvkPipelineStack SquatPipelineStack AdminPipelineStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:image:prod: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=prod cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy DvkBuildImageStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:site:dev: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=dev cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy SquatSiteStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:site:test: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=test cdk --profile=$AWS_PROFILE deploy SquatSiteStack --require-approval never
scripts.remove:loggroups: aws logs describe-log-groups --query 'logGroups[?storedBytes == `0`].logGroupName' --output text | xargs -r -n1 aws logs delete-log-group --log-group-name
scripts.ecr:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com
